metadata.title: Tuesday, 1st March, 2022
metadata.session: FIRST SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to recruit additional agricultural staff for the Department of Agriculture in Mwinilunga District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) how many members of staff are earmarked for recruitment in 2022; and
(d) what categories of staff will be recruited.

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) why the construction of Phase II of the Nkana Water Supply and Sanitation Project in Kamfinsa Parliamentary Constituency has stalled;
(b) when the project will resume; and
(c) whether local contractors in the Constituency will be considered in engaging the new contractor.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to upgrade the Sioma Rural Health Centre in Sioma District to a mini hospital;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to resettle the residents of Chichele area in Ndola District who were evicted from Golden Lay Farm following a court order; and
(b) if so, when the residents will be resettled.

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development and Social Services when the Government will start implementing the fight against child marriage programmes in Chitambo District.

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to electrify the following Chiefdoms in Milanzi Parliamentary Constituency:
(i) Kathumba; and (ii) Kawaza;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) how many households are earmarked for electrification in each Chiefdom.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to deploy additional surgeons to the University Teaching Hospital in Lusaka;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) how many surgeons are earmarked for deployment to the Hospital.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct an airport at Kasaba Bay in Northen Province;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) whether the Zambia National Service (ZNS) has adequate equipment for road construction; and
(b) what the benefits of transferring the Rural Roads Unit to ZNS are.
(a) why the construction of the magistrates court building in Feira District has stalled;
(b) when the project will resume; and
(c) what the cause of the delay in completing the project is.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate Kabwe Central Hospital which is in a deplorable condition;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) when the paving of the hospital grounds will be completed.
(a) what measures the Government is taking to create awareness on effective management of livestock among emerging livestock farmers in Kanchibiya Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) whether the Government has any plans to construct an agriculture training college in the Constituency; and
(c) if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines and Minerals Development
parts: (a) whether the Government is aware that Baluba Mine in Luanshya District is scheduled to close in 2022; and
(b) if so, what measures are being taken to avert job losses.
(a) when the construction of the Sesheke Trades Institute in Katima Mulilo Ward in Sesheke Parliamentary Constituency will be completed;
(b) what the cause of the delay in completing the project is;
(c) what the total cost of the project is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.
(a) whether the Sondashi 2000 herbal drug is effective in curing HIV/AIDS;
(b) why it has taken long to determine the efficacy of the drug;
(c) what the status of the clinical trials on the drug is;
(d) whether the Government is aware that some organizations have been selling drugs which they claim cure HIV/AIDS; and
(e) if so, what measures the Government is taking to protect citizens from procuring such drugs from unlicensed persons. __________________________
